about_the_game: Step into a meticulously crafted fantasy realm, reminiscent of past 'Zelda' games. Immerse yourself in a hack-and-slash adventure with challenging dungeon crawling as you solve weapon-themed puzzles, engage epic bosses, and unravel the enigmatic tapestry of Alligori. Engage in city-building, unlocking new gameplay features and character progression with each building upgrade. Master the art of crafting, creating unique rings which bolster character stats, amulets which alter weapon abilities, and armor to make dungeon bosses tolerable. Elevate the adventure with co-op multiplayer gameplay, combining forces with fellow players to unravel the mystery behind the land of Alligori!

short_description: The land of Alligori needs a new king, and you've been requested to take over your grandfathers kingdom! Build your kingdom up from a village, to a town, city, and finally a kingdom. Delve into dungeons with puzzle-themed weapons, face epic bosses, and craft rings and amulets to help along the way!
